subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Regan Smith moved in front on a caution nine laps from the end and survived a green-white-checker finish to win the Southern 500 for his first Sprint Cup victory Saturday night.
snippet: Regan Smith moved in front on a caution nine laps from the end and survived a green-white-checker finish to win the Southern 500 for his first Sprint Cup victory Saturday night.
